metadata.title: CVE-2017-9113 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
In OpenEXR 2.2.0, an invalid write of size 1 in the bufferedReadPixelsfunction in ImfInputFile.cpp could cause the application to crash orexecute arbitrary code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9113` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr22 - 2.2.0-10ubuntu2.1
openexr - 2.2.0-10ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-10ubuntu2.1').
